1.text:
●Scene: Sol and Isk in a service H-scene, with Isk
as the main.

7.name: Narration
7.text:
Inside the dimly lit cheap inn, Sol's tail is

45.name: Narration
45.text:

53.name: Narration
53.text:
Will he be able to endure until the so-called
